FrageText.de: Was können Sie regelmäßig an der Gabel Ihres Motorrades überprüfen?
FrageText.en: What can you regularly check on your motorcycle's fork?
FrageText.hr: Što možete redovito provjeravati na vilici svog motocikla?
FrageText.sl: Kaj morate redno na vilicah Vašega motornega kolesa preverjati?
FrageText.tr: Motorsikletinizin maşasında düzenli olarak neyi kontrol edebilirsiniz?

en.Text: An oil leak from the fork shaft
Play in the main fork bearing
The effectiveness of the steering damper
